Whistler Blackcomb Annual Week Jan. 6th-12th

Whistler Week Description:

OvRride decided to once again take a trip to Whistler to see if it would be as good the second time around. Turns out the hype is the truth!!! That’s why we’ve incorporated Whistler into our annual calendar… In January we’ll be running our third annual “No Winter Without Whistler.”

Do we need to say much more than… THIS IS THE BEST MOUNTAIN RESORT IN THE WORLD!?!

If there’s one trip not to be missed this year, than this is that trip. Come join us for the annual excursion in British Columbia. All ability levels are welcome. The nightlife is just legendary as the terrain!!!

Whistler Week Includes:

• 7 days in Whistler, British Columbia
• Roundtrip Airfare To and From Newark Airport
• 5-Day Lift Tickets at The Legendary Whistler/Blackcomb Resort
• Charter Coach Bus – To / From Vancouver airport
• Lodging at Glacier Condos, Private Hot Tubs Outside, Heated Pools (Right at the Base of the Village)
• Some of the best winter weather in the world, casinos, breweries, good people, and one hell of a good time

Whistler – British Columbia, Canada

Whistler Week Dates:

Monday Jan. 6th – Sunday Jan. 12th, 2014

Whistler Week Rates

Deposit of $449.95 Reserves Any Package

Whistler Week Flight Times:

Flight Schedule (Approx., Subject to Change):

NYC–> Whistler, Monday Jan. 6th
• Depart Newark 7:00am (Be at airport 5:30am latest) –>
• We will put together a shuttle service from Midtown NYC to/from Airport TBA
• Private Bus Transfer set up for transit from Vancouver airport –> Glacier Condos

Whistler –> NYC, Sunday Jan. 12th
• Private Bus Transfer departing Glacier Condos 10am (Don’t be late) –> airport
• Depart Vancouver 3:45pm –>
• We will put together a shuttle service from Midtown to/from Airport TBA

About OvRride

OvRride is a collective of snowboarders from around the world who have come together in New York City to create the first and only rider owned and operated tour company in the Metro area.

Lead by New York’s most experienced Snowboard industry veterans, the OvRride team helps riders and skiers escape from the concrete canyons of NYC to the pristine peaks of America’s North East and beyond. Our goal in mind; to OvRride the Everyday!

Whether its running daily luxury bus trips to the best mountain resorts in the North East or leading our travelers on international riding adventures, there is one thing that never changes; our dedication to our customer’s experience!
